data.persona: I was hired to paint a portrait of the noblewoman the king would eventually marry. It seems that the painting was too flattering and when the king lifted the veil, he was very angry. I have been imprisoned for four long years. I had a wife and six children, but they do not wait for me to return. I turn my agony into art.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Maids' Room.
Inside the maids room is dark and grey.  It is much different from the rest of the Castle which has grand walls and floors and paintings from famous painters around the wall.  The maid holds many secrets in this room.  One which is a secret door that holds paintings she should not have.
There's a floor, a brush, and a tape here.
The worker is here.

You are carrying a fresh red paint and a paint brushes, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I must finish my painting of the castle
data.mid_motivation: I need to give the maid a gift for her loyalty
data.long_motivation: I am going to attempt to escape with the maid's help because she knows all the secret exits to the castle

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use brush with fresh red paint

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use tape with fresh red paint
